verbs.description: Analysis : [ARG0: Both President Trump and Kim Jong Un] [V: see] [ARG1: themselves] [ARG2: as having the upper hand in North Korea 's decision to end nuclear tests] . The Trump administration believes Kim is backing down . But is he really ?
